content: sts remain you now have 10 14 sts on both needles break yarn leaving long enough strand to graft toe using kitchener stitch graft remaining stitches together finishing weave in all loose ends block as desired pattern originally appeared in knitscene fall 2009 many thanks to emily williams for modeling © 2010 star athena - all rights reserved 5 http //keeponknittinginthefreeworld blogspot com/ © 2010 star athena - all rights reserved 6 http //keeponknittinginthefreeworld blogspot com/ © 2010 star athena - all rights reserved 7 http //keeponknittinginthefreeworld blogspot com/
